name: Robber Rideshare
description:
ROBBER RIDESHARE

(Play in Fullscreen)

An oblivious Oober driver finds themselves an impromptu getaway driver for three robbers escaping the police after a successful heist. How big of a tip can they earn as they dodge cops, cars, and carnage while speeding down the highway?

Created by team B*ner Fraud at the 2021 AET Game Jam with the theme: "Are we the bad guys?"

CONTROLS:

Click to advance text
W and S to move up and down

CREDITS:
